short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance user-friendly experience with convenient productivity tools, chat blur, scheduling, reminders, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your WhatsApp experience super smart with Potency's cool features! We've got all sorts of tools to make running your business a breeze and chatting with customers, friends and your loved once a piece of cake.

Explore Our Features:

✔️Quick WhatsApp Message Sharing
✔️Easy Customer Managements with Tabs
✔️Smart Scheduled WhatsApp Message
✔️Smart Reminder
✔️Productivity Tools: Export Group Contacts, New Chat and More 
✔️Private You Chat Using Blur Option
✔️Easy Notes for Mark your Customer Information

Discover potency awesome features to level up your WhatsApp chats and effortlessly connect with your customers. Enhance your business and make scaling up a breeze!

Message Templates:
Simplify your marketing with Potency's template feature! Create pre-built templates quickly to enhance your workflows, making your marketing process swift and efficient. No more complexity—welcome seamless marketing with improved conversions!

Schedule Message:
Take charge with Potency! Design the perfect message schedule that suits your timeline. Set the day, time, and use templates to ensure your messages reach your audience at the ideal moment. No more stress about timing—let your messages work their magic hassle-free!

Notes:
Enjoy the convenience of Potency Notes! Keep essential data at your fingertips, eliminating the need for external notes or relying on memory alone. Stay organized, record calls, and never miss valuable information in your WhatsApp conversations.

Reminder:
Stay on top of tasks and never miss a deadline with Potency's reminder feature! Set up alarms and notifications to keep your to-do list in check. Customizable follow-ups ensure you stay organized, whether it's for appointments, deadlines, or critical information. Effortlessly stay on track!

Productivity Tools:
Potency brings you essential features like Blur WhatsApp, WhatsApp Link Generator, Triggers, and Export Contact List. Save time and simplify your business with the Potency Productivity Tool.

Note: WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is an independent product developed by Potency and has no relationship with WhatsApp, WhatsApp Inc, or Facebook Inc. It is not an official WhatsApp or Facebook product.
